name: Charging Gaia
text:
While "Gaia the Dragon Champion" is in your Monster Zone, your opponent cannot activate cards or effects during the Battle Phase. During your Main Phase: You can activate 1 of these effects.
? Reveal 1 "Gaia The Fierce Knight" monster in your hand; add 1 Level 5 Dragon monster from your Deck to your hand.
? Reveal 1 Level 5 Dragon monster in your hand; add 1 "Gaia The Fierce Knight" monster from your Deck to your hand.
You can only use this effect of "Charging Gaia" once per turn.
